languages.text: "Вы обещаете, что спасете меня? Какое интересное приключение может из этого получиться! Ради одного этого стоит попасть в неприятности! Принимаю ставку!"
"You promise to save me? What an exciting adventure that could turn out to be! It's almost worth getting into trouble for! I accept your stake!"
languages.original_text: "Вы обещаете, что спасете меня? Какое интересное приключение может из этого получиться! Ради одного этого стоит попасть в неприятности! Принимаю ставку!"

traits.locale_text: "You promise to save me? What an exciting adventure that could turn out to be! It's almost worth getting into trouble for! I accept your stake!"
"You promise to save me? What an exciting adventure that could turn out to be! It's almost worth getting into trouble for! I accept your stake!"
"You promise to save me? What an exciting adventure that could turn out to be! It's almost worth getting into trouble for! I accept your stake!"
"You promise to save me? What an exciting adventure that could turn out to be! It's almost worth getting into trouble for! I accept your stake!"

languages.text: “你答应会救我一命？没想到这场冒险居然会变得这么刺激！你的承诺几乎都值得我去主动惹麻烦了！我接受你的承诺！”
languages.original_text: "You promise to save me? What an exciting adventure that could turn out to be! It's almost worth getting into trouble for! I accept your stake!"

traits.locale_text: “你答应会救我一命？没想到这场冒险居然会变得这么刺激！你的承诺几乎都值得我去主动惹麻烦了！我接受你的承诺！”

languages.text: 「あたしを救うと約束してくれる？なんてエキサイティングな冒険かしら！トラブルに巻き込まれる価値がありそうね！賭けを受けましょう！」
languages.original_text: "You promise to save me? What an exciting adventure that could turn out to be! It's almost worth getting into trouble for! I accept your stake!"

traits.locale_text: 「あたしを救うと約束してくれる？なんてエキサイティングな冒険かしら！トラブルに巻き込まれる価値がありそうね！賭けを受けましょう！」

languages.text: «¿Promete salvarme? ¡Eso sí que sería una aventura fascinante! ¡Casi merece la pena meterme en problemas solo por eso! ¡Acepto con mucho gusto!».
languages.original_text: "You promise to save me? What an exciting adventure that could turn out to be! It's almost worth getting into trouble for! I accept your stake!"

traits.locale_text: «¿Promete salvarme? ¡Eso sí que sería una aventura fascinante! ¡Casi merece la pena meterme en problemas solo por eso! ¡Acepto con mucho gusto!».

languages.text: « Vous promettez de me sauver ? Quelle aventure passionnante ça pourrait être ! De quoi me donner envie de courir au-devant du danger ! J'accepte ! »
languages.original_text: "You promise to save me? What an exciting adventure that could turn out to be! It's almost worth getting into trouble for! I accept your stake!"

traits.locale_text: « Vous promettez de me sauver ? Quelle aventure passionnante ça pourrait être ! De quoi me donner envie de courir au-devant du danger ! J'accepte ! »

languages.text: "Ihr versprecht, mich zu retten? Das könnte ein richtig spannendes Abenteuer werden! Ich glaube, ich sollte wirklich in Schwierigkeiten geraten! Ich nehme Euren Einsatz an!"
languages.original_text: "You promise to save me? What an exciting adventure that could turn out to be! It's almost worth getting into trouble for! I accept your stake!"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr versprecht, mich zu retten? Das könnte ein richtig spannendes Abenteuer werden! Ich glaube, ich sollte wirklich in Schwierigkeiten geraten! Ich nehme Euren Einsatz an!"

languages.text: "Beni kurtaracağına söz veriyor musun? Heyecan dolu bir macera olabilir! Sırf bu yüzden başımı belaya sokasım geldi! Bahsini kabul ediyorum!"
languages.original_text: "You promise to save me? What an exciting adventure that could turn out to be! It's almost worth getting into trouble for! I accept your stake!"

traits.locale_text: "Beni kurtaracağına söz veriyor musun? Bu ne kadar da heyecan dolu bir macera olurdu! Sırf bu yüzden başımı belaya sokasım geldi! Bahsini kabul ediyorum!"
